title: Project for Designing Inquiry-Based Mathematics Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Team-based inquiry activities in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment. Instructors design learner-driven problem-solving environments using learning apps and digital resources.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve real-world math problems following the inquiry learning cycle (question-hypothesis-investigation-conclusion).
Learners can collaborate with team members to collect, analyze, and visualize data using online collaboration tools and learning apps.
Learners can effectively communicate mathematical principles discovered during inquiry through project reports and presentations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
